text:
In the anova-SVM example on Haxby, we are using SelectKBest. However, when doing full-brain analysis, it is better to use SelectPercentile, keeping 10% of voxels (because it is independent of the resolution of the data).

I think that it would be more useful for the end user to use SelectPercentile. What do people think?
title: In the anova SVM example on Haxby, we should use SelectPercentile
In the anova SVM example on Haxby, we should use SelectPercentile

text:
Good idea, perhaps we could even add this reflection as a comment to the
example script.
